title: Rock Anthem
description: In the second book of the Levels series Madeleine Bride and Eddy Moon fight to be themselves as their mythic fates take terrifying turns.Another legendary character appears at Levels College, threatening the school and all its rich and sporty inhabitants while at the same time Madeleineâ€™s friends become drawn into her extraordinary backstory. Will they accept the history that makes her one of a kind? Or will they themselves be victim to the dark and ancient forces pursuing Madeleine and Eddy?
author: J.D. Field
